name: Gingerbread-Escape 2: Holiday Cookie-Escape
description:
Gingerbread Escape is an epic adventure game where you play the runaway cookie characters of the Gingerbread Man, the Witch, the Easter Bunny, the Leprechaun, or the Snowman!

The cookie characters need your help! Help them escape from the oven before they are baked and eaten! Fun for the kids and entire family!

• Amazing graphics!
• Play as 5 unlockable characters!
• Tons of different stages to beat!
• Collect cookies for more points!
• Play in 4 different levels!
• Play solo or against friends!
• Do tricks in the air to get more points!
• Easy sharing on Facebook or via email!

------------------------------------------------------------
*Please leave us a nice review if you enjoy this game!*
*As we cannot reply to AppStore reviews, please visit our website for support!*
